description: Rima`s Guardian Character and represents Rima`s desire to make others laugh. When she Character Changes, Rima becomes a gag character (which she is embarrassed to use) and uses a signature phrase and pose: "Bala-Balance" (Balancing Balance) from the magazine Great Gag Manga King. During Character Transformation, Rima becomes Clown Drop.
name: Kusukusu
